name: Charity Shop Orphans Booklet
description:
This colourful booklet contains 32 full colour pages illustrating the orphan's before and after journey.

There exists 200 Charity Shop Orphan individuals and 25 families in my collection, some of which are portrayed in the illustrated booklet. 

It is printed on paper from a responsibly managed and sustainable source using vegetable oil based inks. Bound with a single staple.
